EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Garmin Appreciation Night_Kansas City_Q317.Garmin Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal's Garmin Appreciation Night Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We look forward to seeing you tomorrow at Pivotal's Garmin Appreciation Night at Kauffman Stadium.This will be a fun night in our Party Suite watching the KC Royals vs Detroit Tigers.As a reminder, the gates and suites will open at 6:00PM. Please enter through gate A for access to our suite; Hall of Fame Suite #2.
Date: Tuesday, September 26, 2017
Time:
6PM Gate Open
Location: Kauffman Stadium 1 Royal Way Kansas City, MO 64129 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Kauffman+Stadium/@39.051676,-94.4825029,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x87c0e4a099dca071:0xe595daf73fe0c690!8m2!3d39.0516719!4d-94.4803142]]>)
If you have any questions about this event please contact us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>. We look forward to seeing you there!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Garmin-Appreciation-Night-St-Louis.html]]>
